content:
# I have successfully harvested 10 iron ore from the iron ore patch! My inventory now contains:
# - 10 Coal
# - 10 Stone
# - 10 Iron Ore
#
# With these materials, I can now proceed to craft the necessary components for the burner mining drill:
# 1. Iron Plates (which require smelting the iron ore)
# 2. Iron Gear Wheels (which also require iron plates)
# 3. A Stone Furnace

# First, I will need to smelt the iron ore into iron plates. I will place a stone furnace for this purpose.

# Let's check if I have enough materials to craft the stone furnace first.
stone_furnace_recipe = get_prototype_recipe(Prototype.StoneFurnace)
print(f'Stone Furnace Recipe: {stone_furnace_recipe}')  # Display the required materials for the stone furnace.
